title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: y 2 −y=6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BB6@

1 point is earned for solving for y

2 points are earned for tangent lines

When x=1,  y 2 −y=6                         y 2 −y−6=0                       (y−3)(y+2)=0                        y=3, y=−2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@881D@

At (1, 3), dy dx = 9−9 6−1 =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4182@

Tangent line equation is y = 3

At (1, -2), dy dx = −6−4 −4−1 = −10 −5 =2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4878@

Tangent line equation is y + 2 = 2(x - 1)

1 point is earned for substituting y= 1 2 x 2  or x=± 2y MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4462@ into the equation for the curve

1 point is earned for solving for x-coordinate

Tangent line is vertical when 2xy− x 3 =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D49@

x(2y− x 2 )=0 gives x=0 or y= 1 2 x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4FEF@

There is no point on the curve with x-coordinate 0.

When y= 1 2 x 2 ,  1 4 x 5 − 1 2 x 5 =6                         − 1 4 x 5 =6                             x= −24 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@7743@
